title: Diamond Mangalsutra Pendant - Tarakshi Design
materials: brilliant-cut diamonds. The gold has a subtle Hyderabadi polish
features: This contemporary Mangalsutra pendant showcases a delicate Tarakshi design, a traditional Telugu art of inlaying fine metal strands. The diamonds are meticulously pave-set, creating a mesmerizing sparkle. The pendant's curved shape is inspired by traditional South Indian arches, blending heritage with modern aesthetics. The two loops for the mangalsutra chain showcase detailed floral open work.
colors: Rose gold with brilliant white diamonds. The rose gold provides a warm
romantic contrast to the dazzling diamonds.
occasions: or as a meaningful gift for a modern bride. A sophisticated piece that complements both traditional sarees and contemporary outfits.
description: This Mangalsutra pendant is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship, blending the richness of Telugu heritage with modern design sensibilities. The sparkling diamonds symbolize everlasting love, making it a cherished heirloom for generations to come. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable everyday wear, while the Hyderabadi polish guarantees lasting brilliance.
